other_title: Apprentice of the Gods: Secretive Cocotama
かみさまみならいヒミツのここたま (Japanese)
plot: Kokoro Yotsuba is a fifth-grade student who is very clumsy but very careful and caring to her belongings, learning from her grandmother about "everything has a soul". One day, she witness the birth of a strange creature from one of her colored pencils: a Cocotama named Luckytama. Surprised on each other, and with Kokoro now permanently linked to the "Contract of Secrecy", she must agree to keep their kind a secret to the world. Now living with Luckytama, she and him learn each others' friendship while meeting with other Cocotamas.
opening_theme: "Korokoro Koko Tama!" (ころころここたま！) by ERIKA
ending_theme: "Kokon Poi Poi Kokottama!" (ここんぽいぽいここったま！) by Melori and the Kokotama Five
"Kokoro Daisuki Kokottama!" (こころだいすきここったま!) by Kaede Hondo & Megumi Han
